body:
Heyo.
So. How many medals have earned in your life? None, a specific number, a lot......
Eh, 62 medals :>
Rule:
1 Medal = 1 Medal
1 Trophy = 2 Medals 
If you have more than 200 medals, put Max
Rank:
1) iRapGod (200+ Medals)
2) _ColdCraftMC_ (200+ Medals)
3) Newcleus (200+ Medals)
4) FlyHacks (137 Medals)
5) AtuismIsintFunny (88 Medals)
6) GrapeSmoothie (79 Medals)
7) Juanoh (69 Medals)
8) Tynvale (66 Medals)
9) Spoookeh (63 Medals)
10) NitroFunky (62 Medals)
Will be updated according to who has the highest number of medals ( 11, 8, 6 and 3...).
Medals don't have to be only for sports. Anything!
